title: Microsoft commits billions to expand AI and cloud infrastructure in Canada and India
description: Microsoft has announced major AI and cloud infrastructure investments totaling 19 billion CAD in Canada and 17.5 billion USD in India. Read more...

title: Wednesday briefing: Why is AI becoming the go-to support for our children’s mental health?
description: In today’s newsletter: Chatbots are becoming confidants for young people in distress​ – raising urgent questions about safeguarding, regulation and the limits of synthetic empathy

title: South Korea targets deceptive AI ads with new labeling rules
description: South Korea will require advertisers to label their ads made with artificial intelligence technologies from next year as it seeks to curb a surge of deceptive promotions featuring fabricated experts or deep-faked celebrities endorsing food or pharmaceutical products on social media. Following a policy meeting chaired by Prime Minister Kim Min-seok on Wednesday, officials said they will ramp up screening and removal of problematic AI-generated ads and impose punitive fines, citing growing risks to consumers, especially older people who struggle to tell whether content is AI-made.
